Package com.doa.engine.graphics

Class DoaSprites

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.doa.engine.graphics.DoaSprites
  • public final class DoaSprites
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for providing a Factory to create Sprites for DoaEngine to display. This class is static, therefore has no objects.
    Since:
    DoaEngine 1.1
    Version:
    2.5
    Author:
    Doga Oruc

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.awt.image.BufferedImage> ORIGINAL_SPRITES
      Collection that maps sprite names to sprites.
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.awt.image.BufferedImage> SHADED_SPRITES
      Collection that maps sprite names to sprites that are shaded according to the lights the scene has.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      private DoaSprites()  

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.awt.image.BufferedImage createSprite​(java.lang.String spriteName, java.lang.String spriteFile)
      Creates a sprite, adds the created sprite toDoaSprites.ORIGINAL_SPRITES, and returns the newly created sprite.
      static java.awt.image.BufferedImage createSpriteFromSpriteSheet​(java.lang.String spriteName, java.lang.String spriteFile, java.awt.Rectangle boundaries)
      Creates a sprite from a sprite-sheet by cropping the sprite-sheet using the boundaries parameter, adds the created sprite to DoaSprites.ORIGINAL_SPRITES, and returns the newly created sprite.
      static java.awt.image.BufferedImage deepCopyDoaSprite​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage sprite)
      Deep copies a DoaSprite

      Conveniency method.

      Creates a scaled version of a DoaSprite.A new DoaSprite will be returned as a result of this call.

        Collection that maps sprite names to sprites.

      • SHADED_SPRITES

        public static final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.awt.image.BufferedImage> SHADED_SPRITES
        Collection that maps sprite names to sprites that are shaded according to the lights the scene has.

    • Method Detail

      • createSprite

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage createSprite​(java.lang.String spriteName,
                                                        java.lang.String spriteFile)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a sprite, adds the created sprite toDoaSprites.ORIGINAL_SPRITES, and returns the newly created sprite.
        Parameters:
        spriteName - name of the sprite that will be created
        spriteFile - path to the sprite on the disk
        Returns:
        the sprite in DoaSprites.ORIGINAL_SPRITES whose name is spriteName
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if sprite cannot be loaded by DoaEngine

      • createSpriteFromSpriteSheet

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage createSpriteFromSpriteSheet​(java.lang.String spriteName,
                                                                       java.lang.String spriteFile,
                                                                       java.awt.Rectangle boundaries)
                                                                throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a sprite from a sprite-sheet by cropping the sprite-sheet using the boundaries parameter, adds the created sprite to DoaSprites.ORIGINAL_SPRITES, and returns the newly created sprite.
        Parameters:
        spriteName - name of the sprite that will be created
        spriteFile - path to the sprite-sheet from which the new sprite will be cropped from
        boundaries - bounding box of the sprite inside the sprite-sheet, i.e. where the sprite is inside the sprite-sheet
        Returns:
        the sprite in DoaSprites.ORIGINAL_SPRITES whose name is spriteName
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if sprite-sheet cannot be loaded by DoaEngine

      • get

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage get​(java.lang.String spriteName)
        Conveniency method. This method exists solely to reduce the amount of typing required while trying to retrieve a sprite from DoaSprites class. Calling this method is equivalent to calling: DoaSprites.SHADED_SPRITES.get(spriteName);
        Parameters:
        spriteName - name of the sprite that is trying to be retrieved
        Returns:
        the sprite in DoaSprites.SHADED_SPRITES whose name is spriteName

      • deepCopyDoaSprite

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage deepCopyDoaSprite​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage sprite)
        Deep copies a DoaSprite
        Parameters:
        sprite - DoaSprite to deep copy
        Returns:
        the deep copy of the passed DoaSprites

      • scale

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage scale​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage sprite,
                                                 int width,
                                                 int height)
        Creates a scaled version of a DoaSprite.A new DoaSprite will be returned as a result of this call. The returned sprite is not stored neither inside DoaSprites.ORIGINAL_SPRITES, nor DoaSprites.SHADED_SPRITES.
        Parameters:
        sprite - DoaSprite to scale
        width - width of the scaled DoaSprite
        height - height of the scaled DoaSprite
        Returns:
        the scaled instance of the passed DoaSprite

      • toCompat

        private static java.awt.image.BufferedImage toCompat​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage sp)
